entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 19. POP 60%
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness after midnight then 60 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming southwest 20 near midnight. Low minus 19. Wind chill minus 23 in the evening and minus 28 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 10 February 2023
